text.0: flow cheering gods most active winner of the flood for indra and for vāyu and for varuṇa.
text.1: bestow on us today wide room with happiness and in tbine ample dwelling laud the host of heaven.
text.2: he who hath come anear to creatures that have life immortal soma flows onward to all of them.
text.3: effecting for our aid both union and release indu like sūrya follows closely after dawn.
text.4: he who is poured with milk he who within the plants hastes bringing treasure for the happiness of gods.
text.5: he poured forth in a stream flows with the lightnings flash soma who gladdens indra and the host of heaven.
text.6: winner of thousands he this soma flows along raising a vigorous voice that wakens with the dawn.
text.7: indu with winds drives on the ocean of the air he sinks within the jars he rests in indras heart.
text.8: the kine with milk dress him who makes the milk increase soma amid the songs who finds the light of heaven.
text.9: winner of wealth the effectual juice is flowing on singer and sage by wisdom dear as heaven itself.
